original_text: People were bringing little children to Jesus. They wanted him to put his hands on each child's head. The disciples told the people that they should not do that.
korean_text: 사람들이 예수께서 만져 주심을 바라고 어린 아이들을 데리고 오매 제자들이 꾸짖거늘

sentences.original_text: People were bringing little children to Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 예수께 어린 아이들을 데려오고 있었다

sentences.original_text: They wanted him to put his hands on each child's head
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 예수께 각 어린이의 머리에 손을 얹어주시기를 원했다

sentences.original_text: that they should not do that
